column2: Data usable by public under designated License or Terms of Use.
Complete data usable by researchers and/or partners for vetted research purposes with limited controls. If disclosed, internal information has a minimal impact to the organization.
Complete data usable only at the team level. If disclosed, the confidential information could negatively affect your organization..

Restricted information is highly sensitive and its use should be limited on a need-to-know basis. Data usable only with Data Use Agreement.  If disclosed, there would be a significant legal impact to the business.
